sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Typography, Button, Grid } from '@material-ui/core' import InstagramIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Instagram'; import TwitterIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Twitter'; import LinkedInIcon from '@material-ui/icons/LinkedIn' import ContactForm from './ContactForm' import EmailIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Email'; export default function Contact(){ return( {/* to have "contact us" in the center Contact Us */} Contact Us contact@ourmomentum.org If you have any questions, comments or feedback, please let us know here! Someone from our team will respond as soon as possible! ( PS – If you want to tell our team how good looking they are, that’s ok too :) ) ) }
